title: Ticket #5460: HTCondor View: Unify Javascript
description:
All JavaScript should be in a single file for simplicity.

For now: just merge it all together manually.

For the future: Break it back into individual files and add a build step to concatenate, compress/uglify, and build a source map so debugging remains reasonable. I'm putting this offer because it adds a number of dependencies, in particular the tool to build the source map and perhaps tool to compress/uglify.
remarks:
2016-Jan-04 14:45:45 by adesmet:
Stage one (quick and dirty unify all of the files) done.
creator: adesmet
